Text: We need to arrest ALL the illegals in the country and sentence them to a couple years of prison at hard labor before deporting them. Make them work at building a nice electrified fence/wall in two tiers with a 50-yard minefield in between them and machinegun towers every hundred yards or so along the inner barrier. Let Mexico keep their people and their drugs; we don't want either!!!

haha @tdatb... sounds like a John Carpenter movie... Escape from New York and Escape from LA.

If we can just get Kurt Russel to act, it would be a surefire blockbuster... Escape from USA where only citizens are allowed!
